George Waters Russell

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Ancel Mathews
  3. Location of Family: Wymore, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Blue Springs, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 1873-01-08, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1953-09-04, Indianola, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Nora Wing Russell
  11. Source: History of Dundy County, Nebraska, 1880-1987, p. 579-580; 1900 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Benkelman Post and News Chronicle, 10 September 1953.
